text_126.en: Adds an image into your layout. Images serve to visually enhance applications, displaying graphics or photos.

text_127.en: Add an image into your app using the `addImage` method like this:

text_135.en: Please note that a `canvas` image cannot switch to Button or Avatar in `setOptions` method.

text_137.en: Here are the available setters and getters for the Image Component.

text_192.en: Here are the available methods of the Image Component.

text_194.en: Enable or disbale the context menu or the right click menus.

text_202.en: Get the color of a single pixel in the image. The returned array is of the form `[red, green, blue, alpha]`.

text_209.en: Sets the color of a specific pixel in the canvas.

text_214.en: Returns the pixel data of the image.

text_222.en: Set the pixel data of the canvas.

text_229.en: Sets a single line font styling for rendering text on canvas.

text_235.en: Draws a line between two points in the canvas.

tip_243.en: This works only when a `canvas` option is pass.

text_245.en: Draws a circle in the canvas.

tip_253.en: This works only when a `canvas` option is pass.

text_255.en: Draws a square into the canvas.

tip_263.en: This works only when a `canvas` option is pass.

text_265.en: Draws a rectangle into the canvas.

tip_274.en: This works only when a `canvas` option is pass.

text_276.en: Draws an arc in the canvas.

tip_287.en: This works only when a `canvas` option is pass.

text_289.en: Draws a polyline on the canvas by passing an array of points.

text_294.en: Draws a polygon on the canvas by passing an array of points.

text_300.en: Draws a single pixel point in a specified coordinate.

text_307.en: Add a text in the canvas image.

text_316.en: Draws an image to the canvas.

tip_323.en: This works only when a `canvas` option is pass.

text_325.en: Clears the drawings by filling the whole canvas with white background color.

text_328.en: Translate the origin of the canvas at a new coordinate with the given angle of rotation.

text_334.en: Rotate the canvas at a given angle and pivot point.

text_340.en: Measure the text metrics with the current settings of the canvas context.

text_345.en: Add a callback function on touch down event.

text_349.en: Add a callback function on touch up event.

text_353.en: Sets a callback function when the image component is touch.

text_357.en: Sets a callback function on load event.

text_361.en: Sets a callback function when the a mouse move event is triggered.

text_365.en: Adds a callback handler for a long touch event. The touch timer is about 500 milliseconds.

text_32.en: Adds a callback function on right click.

text_41.en: Sets the size of the component.

text_58.en: Sets the x and y scaling of the component.

text_63.en: Returns the position of the component. The return object is of the form `{left, top, right, bottom}`

text_68.en: Sets the margin of the component.

text_76.en: Sets the padding of the component's container.

text_84.en: Sets the position of the component relative to its parent dimensions.

text_90.en: Sets the border line for the component container.

text_99.en: Sets the corner radius of the component.

text_107.en: Bring this component forward by a given z-index.

text_111.en: Bring this component backward by a given z-index.
